attributes.action: Will the government make a statement as to how they can possibly run the tax up
attributes.background: Stop the tax rise on any vehicle, and ban electric vehicles from having under 18’s even as passengers

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
 
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, for example banning under 18s from being passengers in electric vehicles

You may also wish to sign this petition which calls for road tax on zero-emission vehicles to be stopped: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700253
